simplenlg.kb
Class SimpleKB

java.lang.Object
  simplenlg.kb.SimpleKB
All Implemented Interfaces:
NLGKB
public class SimpleKB
extends Object
implements NLGKB

SimpleKB is a simple implementation of an NLGKB

This provides a very simple implementation of an NLGKB. The KB is explicitly constructed via calls to addClass() and setFeatureValue(). Classes can have ancestors, and inherit default feature values from them

Classes are represented as SimpleKBClass objects a hash table maps names to classes

KBEntity's are represented as SimpleKBClass (ie, there is no distinction between instances and classes)

Author:
ereiter

getClass

public KBEntity getClass(String className)
Description copied from interface: NLGKB
finds the class with the specified name.

depending on the KB, can return an instance of the class or a representation of the class itself. returns null if no class with this name exists.

Specified by:
